driver.label: PostgreSQL (Old)
driver.description: PostgreSQL generic driver. Can be used for old (7.x) or non-standard PostgreSQL servers.

property.label: Show all databases
property.description: Show all databases on server. Otherwise show current database only.

property.label: Show unavailable databases
property.description: Show databases not unavailable for connection.

dashboard.label: Server sessions
dashboard.query: SELECT (SELECT count(*) AS "Active" FROM pg_catalog.pg_stat_activity sa WHERE state='active'), (SELECT count(*) AS "Idle" FROM pg_catalog.pg_stat_activity sa WHERE state='idle'), (SELECT count(*) AS "Total" FROM pg_catalog.pg_stat_activity sa WHERE state IS NOT NULL)

dashboard.label: Transactions per second
dashboard.query: SELECT (SELECT sum(xact_commit) + sum(xact_rollback) AS "Total" FROM pg_stat_database), (SELECT sum(xact_commit) AS "Commit" FROM pg_stat_database), (SELECT sum(xact_rollback) AS "Rollback" FROM pg_stat_database)

dashboard.label: Block IO
dashboard.description: Shows blocking IO operations per second
dashboard.query: SELECT (SELECT sum(blks_read) as "Read" FROM pg_stat_database), (SELECT sum(blks_hit) as "Hits" FROM pg_stat_database)
